CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high V oc of 0.91 V compared to the linear NDT - TPD - based copolymer PNDTTPD with a PCE of 4.0% and a V oc of 0.69 V. 15 Meanwhile , high - performance p-channel fieldeffect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTTPD |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |
| NDT-TPD |
| PNDTTPD |

The paragraph mentions two types of polymer solar cells with different donor and acceptor materials: PzNDTTPD and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM). Additionally, it mentions two types of copolymers: NDT-TPD and PNDTTPD.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTTPD |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |
| NDT-TPD |
| PNDTTPD |

The paragraph mentions four distinct material names: PzNDTTPD, [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM), NDT-TPD, and PNDTTPD. These names refer to specific materials used in the context of the paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high V oc of 0.91 V compared to the linear NDT - TPD - based copolymer PNDTTPD with a PCE of 4.0% and a V oc of 0.69 V. 15 Meanwhile , high - performance p-channel fieldeffect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|-------------------------|
| PCE of PSCs with PzNDTTPD and PC71BM: 5.26% |
| V oc of PSCs with PzNDTTPD and PC71BM: 0.91 V |
| PCE of linear NDT-TPD-based copolymer PNDTTPD: 4.0% |
| V oc of linear NDT-TPD-based copolymer PNDTTPD: 0.69 V |
| Hole mobility: 0.067 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1 |
| On / off current ratio: 10^9 - 10^10. |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|-------------------------|
| PCE of PSCs with PzNDTTPD and PC71BM: 5.26% |
| V oc of PSCs with PzNDTTPD and PC71BM: 0.91 V |
| PCE of linear NDT-TPD-based copolymer PNDTTPD: 4.0% |
| V oc of linear NDT-TPD-based copolymer PNDTTPD: 0.69 V |

These are the entities that clearly refer to the values of material properties mentioned in the paragraph. The other entities, such as "polymer solar cells (PSCs)", "donor and acceptor", "high-performance p-channel field-effect transistors", and "hole mobility" and "on / off current ratio" are not values but rather descriptions or categories of the values presented.
